speaker: JOAN LA PUCELLE
text_entry: Advance our waving colours on the walls;

speaker: JOAN LA PUCELLE
text_entry: Rescued is Orleans from the English

speaker: JOAN LA PUCELLE
text_entry: Thus Joan la Pucelle hath perform'd her word.

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Divinest creature, Astraea's daughter,

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: How shall I honour thee for this success?

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Thy promises are like Adonis' gardens

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: That one day bloom'd and fruitful were the next.

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: France, triumph in thy glorious prophetess!

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Recover'd is the town of Orleans:

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: More blessed hap did ne'er befall our state.

speaker: REIGNIER
text_entry: Why ring not out the bells aloud throughout the town?

speaker: REIGNIER
text_entry: Dauphin, command the citizens make bonfires

speaker: REIGNIER
text_entry: And feast and banquet in the open streets,

speaker: REIGNIER
text_entry: To celebrate the joy that God hath given us.

speaker: ALENCON
text_entry: All France will be replete with mirth and joy,

speaker: ALENCON
text_entry: When they shall hear how we have play'd the men.

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: 'Tis Joan, not we, by whom the day is won;

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: For which I will divide my crown with her,

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: And all the priests and friars in my realm

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Shall in procession sing her endless praise.

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: A statelier pyramis to her I'll rear

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Than Rhodope's or Memphis' ever was:

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: In memory of her when she is dead,

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Her ashes, in an urn more precious

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Than the rich-jewel'd of Darius,

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Transported shall be at high festivals

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Before the kings and queens of France.

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: No longer on Saint Denis will we cry,

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: But Joan la Pucelle shall be France's saint.

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Come in, and let us banquet royally,

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: After this golden day of victory.

speaker: CHARLES
text_entry: Flourish. Exeunt
